entry.source: {F812}Demon Lord Lucifer\0{F87A,-480}{F813,0,262013}Pitiful.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,262014}See what comes of those without power{F801}harboring wishes that exceed their{F801}grasp.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,262015}And all of this because God's puppets{F801}have bound the sons of man in a tepid{F801}world.{F801}
